description: Check a list of gilt-edged stocks and bonds charged on the National Loans Fund.

details.body:
This list shows the titles of gilt-edged securities which have a redemption date on or after 1 January 1992, disposals of which are exempt from tax on chargeable gains under section 115 of the Taxation of Chargeable Gains Act 1992.

HMRC updates this list each time a Treasury Order specifies further exempt gilts.

Stocks and bonds charged on the National Loans Fund
